Type.Name: DelegateWrapper

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DelegateWrapper extends System.Object

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object o) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Callback wrappers should be manually managed for persistence.")

Docs.summary: The is the object that creates the instance of the DelegateWrapper derived class or null if created from a static method.
Docs.remarks: Note that the instances will never be disposed if they are created in a static method.
